entities.name: kraacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who was loyal to the Black family. He is mentioned as being troubled and sobbing hard after an event that happened in the cave.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends and a student at Hogwarts. She is watching Kreacher with tears in her eyes but does not dare touch him again.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends and a student at Hogwarts. He looks troubled while watching Kreacher.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is trying to clear his head after an event that happened in the cave.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a dark wizard who tried to kill Kreacher and Sirius.

entities.name: regulus
entities.description: Regulus is a character who died to bring Voldemort down.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a character who was betrayed by Kreacher and handed over to Voldemort.

entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is a character who received information from Kreacher about Sirius.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is a character who received information from Kreacher about Sirius and passed it on to Voldemort.

relationships.description: Kreacher passed information about Sirius to Narcissa and Bellatrix, who then passed it on to Voldemort.
Regulus died in order to bring down Voldemort.
